days.text: Fine, becoming cloudy. Light rain at night. Force 3 to 4 northeasterly winds.
Mainly cloudy. Light rain at first. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 2 to 3 east to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 3 to 4 easterly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
Temperature falling. Mainly cloudy. A few rain patches. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds, becoming force 5 to 6 northerly winds with gusts.
